attributes.action: provide Government assistance, in the form of direct funding or identification of alternative sources of funding, to restore the Cutty Sark in Greenwich following the fire on 21 May 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Cutty Sark, a key part of Britain's national maritime heritage, was seriously damaged by fire on the morning of 21 May 2007.  A restoration project was already underway to preserve the ship for the nation, and additional funds were still needed to complete it when this tragedy struck.  This petition aims to ask HM Government to recognise the unique importance of this iconic landmark by helping find the extra funds needed to keep the project on track and restore this wonderful ship.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
